name: FILM 160
title: Film Genres
description: Concentrated study of films from one cinematic grouping with similar themes and narrative structures such as westerns, musicals, or science fiction, or a comparative study of different genres. History, theory, and criticism of the genre are covered. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): FILM 130, FILM 132A, FILM 132B, FILM 132C, FILM 134A or FILM 134B.
courses: P FILM 130 FILM 132A FILM 132B FILM 132C FILM 134A

class_notes: Course Topic: FICTIONS OF EMPATHY & PATHOS IN THE AMERICAN SOCIAL PROBLEM FILM
